name: snapdrop
description: Snapdrop is a self-hosted web-based file sharing app that behaves like AirDrop in the browser. Devices on the same network can instantly exchange files without accounts.
features: Local file sharing: Transfers files between devices on the same network instantly.
No installation: Works entirely in the browser without apps or software.
Peer-to-peer transfer: Sends files directly between devices without server storage.
Cross-platform: Shares files between Windows, Mac, Linux, iOS, and Android.
Multiple files: Sends multiple files or folders in a single transfer.
Device discovery: Automatically detects nearby devices on the same network.
Text sharing: Sends text snippets and clipboard content between devices.
Progressive web app: Installs as PWA for quick access from home screen.
No file size limits: Transfers files of any size limited only by device storage.
Privacy focused: Doesn't store files on server or track user activity.
Responsive design: Works seamlessly on desktop and mobile browsers.
Room codes: Creates private rooms for sharing with specific devices.
